special lady x

ur eyes are like satfires glowin in the dark.
if we had a buity contest u would hit judges full mark.

your hair is like a golden briscle leaf in spring.
when i hear u u make me so happy i could sing.

ur figure is so divine.
i wish u were mine

my dear i feel my love 4 u is strong.
this is how i know we should belong.

by we i mean me and u.
i do hope u feel this strongly about me 2.

i think u are my true love.
when i am near u i am in the heaven above.

u are my goddess
y love 4 u i have to confess

dreams come true
wen im wiv u

now u kno i love u
question is do u love me too

my meeting means somthing

my meeting you was fate
there and then i became more than just a mate
when i first saw you i knew you were the one
all the powers of love and emotions have begun
when i looked into your eyes i saw all the peacefulness of the sky
my love for you is something no one can deny
i feel like you are my juliet
you are the most extrordinary women i have ever met
if i was with you i could survive in hell
i will show how much i love you so to the world i tell
because of you i feel like im living a dream
as long as i am with you i will always gleam
my emotions are always high
i know its just for a few hours but i hate saying goodbye
i love u with all my heart
love is my most powerful art
i believe we will be together for all time
so to the women i love let the wedding bells chime

living without you

you told me that wen we split u made up things bout all the guys x
even tho we split i loved u still every day we was apartx
since i met u i kno that no matter wat happens for u there will be a plcae in my heart x
you said u missed me so much n ud do aniythin to get me backx
after listening to all u had to say with a tear in my eye i realised i want u n me to get bk on track x
i wanna lie with u in my arms n kiss u gd nite like i used to dox
the day i met u i knew the only gal i wanna be with is youx
my feelings for u r so very strong i was jus afraid of feeling pain x
i will be with u agen n as long as im with you the sun will always shine n ill never see a drop of rain x
